transArray.content: The room is clean and hygienic, and there is tea in the room. The service is very good, the environment is comfortable, and the breakfast is very good. The cooking, noodles, and porridge are made with Wuchang rice. The local hotel attendant will remind you to take nucleic acid test after entering Beijing!
Dear guest, thank you very much for choosing. Summer has the late glow. Just like the little guy who comes late, everyone is smiling. I love you, little guy.
